text: Lycomimus albocinctus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Melzer in 1931. It is known from Brazil and French Guiana.BioLib.cz - Lycomimus albocinctus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1931
title: Lycomimus albocinctus
